column8: Prime Minister Datuk Seri Najib Tun Razak received well wishes from politicians and netizens on social media for his 64th birthday on Sunday.Najib, who was born on July 23, 1953 in Kuala Lipis, Pahang, is the eldest child of second prime minister, Tun Abdul Razak Hussein.Deputy Prime Minister Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi's office congratulated Najib on Twitter: "May Allah bless your leadership. Your sincerity to upgrade the #B40 group income is noble, Barokallah!"Minister in the Prime Minister's Department Datuk Seri Abdul Rahman Dahlan also wished Najib "Happy Birthday", adding that the Prime Minister should continue his development agenda for the nation.Navy chief Admiral Tan Sri Ahmad Kamarulzaman Ahmad Badaruddin also congratulated Najib, tweeting: "Happy Birthday Sir! DS @NajibRazak #NegaraKuMalaysia (#MycountryMalaysia)."Federal Territories Minister Datuk Seri Tengku Adnan Tengku Mansor wished the Prime Minister "Happy Birthday" by posting a collection of photographs of Najib from the past up to the present.Netizens also conveyed their well wishes to Najib.Karam Singh Rai said on Facebook: "Happy Birthday to you Datuk Seri Najib the Prime Minister of Malaysia, God bless you forever. Our beloved Prime Minister of Malaysia."Kyrian Lazarus? on Twitter called Najib a "hero, role model, an inspirational person and an outstanding leader" on his birthday."#IBelieveInNajib," he said, while Twitter user Zainal Abidin wished the Prime Minister "Happy Birthday."http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...3XkBlhZ1DTvS.99
